author: Agence France-Presse
title: EU divided over virus rescue plan
description: Rich members against long-term pooling of debt with Mediterranean nations they accuse of profligacy
content:
Bitterly divided EU leaders will try Thursday to hammer out a huge coronavirus rescue package, as the WHO warned the pandemic is far from over.
While there are signs the COVID-19 outbreak is slowing and some countries have started to ease restrictions affect… [+5213 chars]
